entry.title: AIY Projects Branding and Packaging
entry.summary: We recently collaborated on the branding and packaging of AIY Projects with Google—do-it-yourself artificial intelligence kits for students and makers. Now available Target. Special thanks to Rob Giampietro, Kirsten Climer and the AIY team. #aiyprojects
entry.content: We recently collaborated on the branding and packaging of AIY Projects with Google—do-it-yourself artificial intelligence kits for students and makers. Now available Target. Special thanks to Rob Giampietro, Kirsten Climer and the AIY team. #aiyprojects

entry.title: Sightglass Coffee Website
entry.summary: Sightglass Coffee’s e-commerce platform needed to match the same dedication to craft and service you come to expect in their retail stores. ETC comprehensively redesigned their website and art directed all of the illustration, photography, animations and videos. See More
entry.content: Sightglass Coffee’s e-commerce platform needed to match the same dedication to craft and service you come to expect in their retail stores. ETC comprehensively redesigned their website and art directed all of the illustration, photography, animations and videos. See More

entry.title: Sightglass Packaging
entry.summary: Continuing a long collaboration with Sightglass Coffee, ETC has recently designed new packaging for their retail, wholesale and subscription programs. The new box has more streamlined shelf appeal, but it was also designed to be modest, eco-friendly and easy to assemble. See More
entry.content: Continuing a long collaboration with Sightglass Coffee, ETC has recently designed new packaging for their retail, wholesale and subscription programs. The new box has more streamlined shelf appeal, but it was also designed to be modest, eco-friendly and easy to assemble. See More

entry.title: FADER 100 + Redesign
entry.summary: For the 100 issue of The FADER, ETC completely redesigned the print publication, refreshed the logo, and unified the branding across their media channels—print, web, video, events. See More
entry.content: For the 100 issue of The FADER, ETC completely redesigned the print publication, refreshed the logo, and unified the branding across their media channels—print, web, video, events. See More

entry.title: FADER 95
entry.summary: FADER 95 featuring Tyler, the Creator, Migos, Future Brown, Rich Homie Quan, Marilyn Manson, Killer Mike, DeJ Loaf, 11 New York Ballers, and more.

entry.title: About ETC
entry.summary: About ETC Everything Type Company (ETC) is a NYC-based graphic design studio founded by Kyle Blue and Geoff Halber. We specialize in branding, art direction, publications, signage, and interactive design and development for clients spanning culture and commerce. Through a collaborative process with our clients,…
entry.content:
About ETC

Everything Type Company (ETC) is a NYC-based graphic design studio founded by Kyle Blue and Geoff Halber. We specialize in branding, art direction, publications, signage, and interactive design and development for clients spanning culture and commerce. Through a collaborative process with our clients, our work materializes from a distinct visual direction and a sensibility for production processes and technology. We are an agile studio committed to creating unique, well-crafted design solutions.
